LanguageData.VEF_ExoticProsthetics.label: Exotic Animal Prosthetics
LanguageData.VEF_ExoticProsthetics.description: Learn to use and craft exotic animal prosthetics to replace such things as tentacles, wings, echolocation organs and so on
LanguageData.VEF_ExoticBionics.label: Exotic Animal Bionics
LanguageData.VEF_ExoticBionics.description: Learn to use and craft exotic bionics to create bionic tentacles, wings, echolocation organs, etc
LanguageData.VEF_AdvancedAnimalImplants.label: Advanced Animal Implants
LanguageData.VEF_AdvancedAnimalImplants.description: Learn to extract certain abilities from animals and implant them in others. Ranged animal attacks can also be implanted in a different animal
LanguageData.AA_Bioships.label: bioships
LanguageData.AA_Bioships.description: Bioships are part animal, part boats. Building of a bioship usually requires specific resources that must be acquired via trading, such as exotic eggs or frozen embryos.
